page.title: 10THE LIVINGSTON TEENAGER
page.content: The Livingston teenager is apparently faced with a host of activities to choose from. However,despite the wide choice of sports,the shopping centre is accepted as a general meeting place and on Saturdays,the centreis mobbed wwith teenagers. Melvilles disco (one of the most sophisticated in Britain) is open for teenagers on a Wednesday evening and this is popular for "eyeing up the talent". At the moment,the town is crawling with break-dancers and bicycle motor cross cyclists. Our walls are liberally decorated with graffiti,as everyone wants to voice their opinions. Glue sniffing is a major social problem at present.
